0: While it may work as a conference center I found it unappealing for a short holiday break over New Years
We have been vacationing in the area for years
The hotel seemed to cater primarily to families which was fine but a surprise to me and my spouse
You also have to time your stay just right or you might be there when they have events with large groups
I was there with a business group and we were served group meals for a group of around 40 people
I also did not find an area to do some of my work away from home even on vacation I still would have liked easy access to a computer did not bring mine
Norman at the pool worked hard refilling my soda all day for me the perfect vacation indulgence
I did not care for the tile in our bathroom it looks holiday inn quality
However had I come just for vacation I would have been very disappointed
Our group included 6 children and 8 adults ages ranging from 18 months to 74 years of age
1: My family and I have been coming here for years
We will definitely book a future trip to the Renaissance Indian Wells Resort Spa in the future
It was one of my favorite hotels till this last trip
We will be coming back to this hotel on our next trip
He wanted it to a Christmas treat for the family since it was our son ’s first time in Palm Springs
Over all it was Fantastic for a little weekend getaway
Pools were great for families and couples
This was a quick one night get away with the family to celebrate Mother ’s Day
